text:
India researchers have made nearly Rs. 5 crore hunting bugs for Facebook

Facebook said on Friday that it has paid Rs. 4.84 crore to researchers in India as part of its bug bounty programme. India holds the top rank among 127 countries contributing to the programme.

Facebook receives more and more high-impact bugs from India each year, reflecting the growing sophistication and technical capabilities of the country’s engineering schools and cyber security programmes
title: India tops FB’s bug bounty programme
